features: Superior Quality Utensil Set for Extraordinary Kids! This cutlery set is made of premium stainless steel and a food-grade BPA-free plastic handle with a matte finish. It is durable for years to come.
Great for School and On The Go: This portable silverware comes with a perfectly designed carrying case and a buckle, so you can easily fasten the whole set to the lunch bag. No more missing utensils!

Modern Design: The reusable utensils are smoothly finished with no sharp edges, perfectly weighted and balanced, safe and comfortable. Mix and match your utensils with any of our Bentoheaven Kids lunch boxes.
Fully Dishwasher-Safe! Really, really hate washing up? Yeah, us too. With Bentoheaven, there’s no need to hand-wash, the cutlery set is completely dishwasher-safe. Upper rack, medium program, done!
What You Get: The 2-piece travel utensil set with a case includes a fork, spoon, and storage case with a buckle. Our customer support is always happy to help if you have any comments or questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bentoheaven Kid Travel Utensils with Protective Case is finally here! It's made from Food-grade stainless steel and BPA-free plastic ensuring the safety of your child's food. We’ve collaborated with hundreds of parents and kids to create 9 unique designs to cheer your child.
Extraordinary Utensil Set for Extraordinary Kids

FULLY DISHWASHER-SAFE Bentoheaven utensil set is fully dishwasher-safe - chuck it all in and forget about it until next lunchtime. SUPERIOR QUALITY Made from durable, food-grade stainless steel and BPA-free plastic. STORAGE CASE It comes with a compact storage case to make sure your utensils stay hygienic all the time. SOFT TO THE TOUCH It comes with a matte, soft texture handle, which is beautiful, calming, and non-slippery.

YOU'LL LOVE THE UNBOXING Your Utensils will arrive in stylish, premium paper box packaging, making the unboxing experience as special as the product itself. SAFETY HOOK Do you hate missing cutleries? Yeah, us too. Prevent cutlery from disappearing by securing the case to your bag. FOR KIDS, BY KIDS We gathered creative kids to pick their favorite animals and activities, inspiring artist Dóra Kövesdi's modern designs with a hint of vibrancy. PROUD TO SUPPORT We have committed to donating a portion of our profits to Feeding America. Last year, we donated to provide 35,000 meals to those in need.

What materials are Bentoheaven Kids Travel Utensils made from? Bentoheaven Kids Travel Utensils are crafted from food-grade stainless steel and BPA-free plastic, ensuring the safety of your child's food. I can't seem to close the case after cleaning it. What's wrong? Ensure utensils are properly arranged in the case for easy closure. If issues persist, contact our support team. Is it dishwasher safe? Yes! Bentoheaven utensil set is fully dishwasher-safe - chuck it all in and forget about it until next lunchtime. Use medium temperature programs and do not heat dry / use the hot air function. How to open the case? Simply pull the handles of the utensil apart to open the case. It's designed for easy access to your utensils. What is the safety hook for? The safety hook secures the utensil set to your bag, preventing loss while you're on the move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels good to the touch, cutlery is just very very cute. Perfect size for my kid, high quality, comfortable, the cover that protects fork and spoon is easy to open and carry. I like the color, kid loves it too and enjoys the stickers in the package. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: Got it today, my granddaughter loves it. Very high quality and very stable. Have to make pasta for dinner because my granddaughter wants to use it tonight. She loves the blue. Would recommend to make kids happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fork and spoon set is an accompaniment to a Bento box, as stated in its description. This set is adorable and a well-made set for a child. The tops of the fork and spoon rest together in a round snap shut adorable holder for sanitary storage. The holder opens easily when you take the adjoining handles of the spoon and fork sticking out of the holder and separate them. The handles are a smooth plastic and will be comfortable in small hands. This set is perfect for home and travel. If I had anything to critique…it would be that the fork is a bit too straight - there is little (to no) curve to it (which I find to be more comfortable for eating). Other than that small adjustment, I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: These are the perfect size for my 4 year old. He loved the green color. It feels durable and not light or cheap. I like that there's a cover for them. However, the fork, I felt, was a bit flat. May not be an issue. The spoon, on the other hand, is a bit flat and will not work for cereal or soup, if that's what you're looking for. Overall, I'm satisfied with the product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sturdy cutlery set for kids
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun set of kids’ cutlery which nests into a cute carrying case. It opens outward so is something kids can handle on their own without needing too much adult intervention which is good for busy school lunches. The size is appropriate from preschool age and onwards but might be a bit large for toddlers to handle ergonomically. Everything is sturdy and well made so should last. I’m hoping that that the carrying case helps my kids keep their cutlery in order and reduces the likelihood of pieces getting lost but time will tell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Utensil Set. Does The Job.
reviews.reviewText: These go easily into my daughter's lunch box for school. Instead of spending money on plastic ware, you save with these. Handy and convenient. Made well and love the snap cover case to keep the mouth parts clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pair with bento box
reviews.reviewText: Pros- the holder can be easily hung on my son's Omie bento box.- the holder dries over night after washing- easy for my 6yo old to take them in and out- I personally prefer this one compare to OmieBox utensils (which is same price) bc this is stainless steel instead of plastic!Cons- so far none

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These utensils are great for on the go. They fit nicely in the case and are easy to put in and out of the case. Super cute design as well for kids.
